title: Breakingviews TV: Tech discord
text:
Breakingviews TV: Tech discord 1:42pm EDT - 03:23 
Spotify is about to list its shares just as sector valuations are sliding amid concerns over Facebook and Amazon. How that plays out will influence what happens to the next generation of tech IPOs, as Robert Cyran explains. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Spotify is about to list its shares just as sector valuations are sliding amid concerns over Facebook and Amazon. How that plays out will influence what happens to the next generation of tech IPOs, as Robert Cyran explains.
